S

send(String) - Method in class academy.mindswap.games_factory.wheel_of_fortune.WheelOfFortune.PlayerHandler
Send the message to the player
Server - Class in academy.mindswap.server
Class responsible for creating the server that will start a game and listen to players When a player arrives his socket will be sent to the available game If a game is already full and not accepting players it creates a new game to accept new players.
Server() - Constructor for class academy.mindswap.server.Server
Constructor method from Server class Creates a list that will hold the active games
SERVER_CLOSE - Static variable in class academy.mindswap.player_client.PlayerMessages
 
SERVER_PORT - Static variable in class academy.mindswap.server.Messages
 
SPIN_WHEEL - Static variable in class academy.mindswap.games_factory.wheel_of_fortune.messages.GameMessages
 
spinWheel() - Method in class academy.mindswap.games_factory.wheel_of_fortune.wheel.Wheel
Method to get a random Command from the created wheel
start(int) - Method in class academy.mindswap.server.Server
Starts the server in the specified port If there is no game available for players to join creates a new one Waits for a client to connect to the server and add it to an available game
START_GAME - Static variable in class academy.mindswap.games_factory.wheel_of_fortune.messages.GameMessages
 
startGame() - Method in class academy.mindswap.games_factory.wheel_of_fortune.WheelOfFortune
Start the Game, add a quote to the game and send messages to all players
startPlay(InetAddress, int) - Method in class academy.mindswap.player_client.PlayerClient
Starts the player in specified port Create a new thread to send messages to game
SUB_HEADING - Static variable in class academy.mindswap.games_factory.wheel_of_fortune.ascii_art.Board
